description: Tooltip message displayed on button that the user presses in order to show fact-checks from an organization.
Tooltip message displayed on button that the user presses in order to hide fact-checks from an organization.
Tooltip message displayed on button that the user presses in order to navigate to the custom list page.
Message displayed on feed top bar when there is no list associated with the feed.
Tooltip message displayed on a button that takes the user toa page where they can add an organization to this shared feed with an expectation to collaborate with the organization.
